title: Tile, late 18th–early 19th century
medium: Earthenware, high fire decorated and glazed
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Man in blue trousers and white apron holding up fish with left hand, while standing at an outdoor stove and stirring contents of a large frying pan with right. A dog is jumping around him.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tile, late 18th–early 19th century.
late 18th–early 19th century. Earthenware, high fire decorated and glazed. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1920-15-31.
